para.p: We follow Rudin [] and Terras [], and refer to sp4comm [] and Folland [].

n

Math.text: (Z / n) * Z = conditional-set@(k + n * Z, k element-of Z) = conditional-set@(k + n * Z, 0 <= k <= n - 1)

Let
G
be a locally compact abelian group.

^ G

∈ x G

(namely, the final topology on
^ G

One proves that
^ G
is a locally compact abelian group.

If
G
is a discrete LCA group, then
^ G
is a compact LCA group.

Let
G
be a finite locally compact abelian group.
G
must have the discrete topology. Hence the Borel
σ

G

G

⁢ P
( G )

( Z )
, define

Math.text: (open-interval@(x, y)) _ (ell ^ 2 * Z) = (sum _ (n element-of Z))@(x * delimited-[]@(n) * overline@(y * delimited-[]@(n)))

para.p:
For
∈ k Z
, define
:
T k
→
C Z
C Z
by

Math.text: formulae@(T _ k * x * delimited-[]@(n) = x * delimited-[]@(n - k), n element-of Z)
